application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details submitted pursuant to reference 23/01098/FUL: acoustic report (8), potable water (13) and energy performance certificate (14) in respect of conversion of the existing 2 x residential units, over first, second and third floor levels, to provide 5 x residential units, infill first and second floor rear extensions with balconies, replacement rear dormers and new rooflights, new access on Green Lanes and Devonshire Mews with refuse and recycling stores with communal amenity space.

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: LHA Maximum Height Level: All buildings, structures, and works exceeding 150 metres in height (492.1 feet).
LLA Maximum height level: All buildings, structures, and works exceeding 150 metres in height (492.1 feet)

DMDDC Designation: District Centre- Name: Palmers Green- Policy: DMD 25, 27, 30-36- Core Strategy: Core policies 17-19

LOHERA Name: Syke's Buildings (Nos 315-397)- Address: Green Lanes, Palmers Green- Type: Shopping parade with flats above.- Local Heritage Asset: The shopping parade  315 - 397 Green Lanes (1907-13) and is designed in an exuberant 'New Elizabethan' style, and is distinctive and possibly unique.  It is a key feature of Palmers Green's street scape, although somewhat neglected.  Designed by Arthur S
